name: Solarbeam
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Solarbeam is a DEX on Moonriver, it harnesses the power of the Moonriver Parachain that is built on Kusama to provide a safe and seamless DEX experience for all users.
